title: Any update on Darius
body: I remember a while back when the gp kit update had been announced that a new darius kit had been in testing and was said to be 90% complete. Just wondering if anything is expected this year for the manly dunkmaster.

replies.body:
We've actually come back around to the work that started 2 years ago and will have something to show very soon. Statikk picked up the darius project after he finished working on Gangplank, and it turns out we can make a lot of improvements for him without too many dramatic changes. 

When it's all done, he should have a more healthy + satisfying + some new unique stuff in his kit.
I hope the Ult stays pretty much as is- for me, it's his defining skill and the most satisfying Ult in the game

I really hope he isn't too drastically changed.  For me, the Q and E are really staple skills on Darius and I think they're perfect as-is.  In particular, that E is one of the main reasons I play (and main) Darius over other champions, and I'd be very, very sad if he lost it.

The W is the main skill of his that doesn't really have "flair"...a quick auto reset that slows their move and attack speed for a short time.  But it's still an important part of his kit.  I guess I'm just pretty worried that this update will upset the balance of his kit in some important way or remove some of the things that make him "fun" to play (positioning for max range Q's, landing E's on fleeing opponents etc.).  I should probably have more faith because the Gangplank update looks wonderful.  But changing this champion just has so many potential downsides that it worries me.
